SHOULD A MINOR NEED PARENTAL CONSENT TO GET AN ABORTION ?
 
 http://www.youdebate.com/DEBATES/ABORTION_PARENTAL_CONSENT.HTM

Absolutely! It is unconscionable that organizations like Planned Parenthood would seek to undermine the rights of parents to know what is occurring in their child's life. If my daughter got pregnant, I would rather talk about it and help her through it than have some seedy organization help her hide it from me.
 
 Minors are not allowed to enter into legal binding contracts, nor should they be able to make an uninformed decision about abortion.

A minor is not allowed to pick up medicine at a drug store.
 Why should a minor be allowed to undergo one of the most risky operations.

Bump
 Any other opinions out there. I concur with these two. 
 
 Allowing a minor to make their own decisions regarding surgical procedures is risky at best. It isn't allowed in the case of a broken arm or some such. The hospital is always required to seek consent. They can operate if it is an emergency but not otherwise. 
 
 Why does planned Parenthood get a different treatment? Aside from the obvious political reasons/
